sect1.para: Providing accurate and up to date documentation to all our users is very important to the NetBSD Project. At times, we have attempted to provide translations of the documentation on our website into a number of languages, but unfortunately it has become obvious that the project is lacking the manpower to keep these translations up to date.

As we believe that providing outdated documentation may actually be more harmful than only providing English content, we have decided to no longer maintain non-English documentation in our ``htdocs'' repository or on our website.

At the same time, we are fully aware of the importance of internationalized documentation and welcome community efforts of providing such translations. If you are working on translations of our website and are hosting these pages on your own server, please let us know.
